Divine Essence.quote: He is the First and the Last, the Manifest and the Hidden. (Quran 57:3)

Absolute Being.quote: Everything will perish save His Face (Essence). (Quran 28:88)

Essential Reality.quote: The Essence (Ain) is that which cannot be known except through Its manifestations. (Ibn Arabi, Fusus al-Hikam)

Divine Vision.quote: Vision perceives Him not, but He perceives all vision. (Quran 6:103)

Eye of Reality.quote: Through His Eye, the universe sees itself. (Al-Jili, Universal Man)

Essential Unity.quote: The Essence is One, though Its attributes are many. (Abdul Karim al-Jili)

Essential Knowledge.quote: The knower and the known are One in the Eye of Reality. (Ibn Arabi)

Divine Perception.quote: I become the hearing with which he hears, and the sight with which he sees. (Hadith Qudsi)

Essential Light.quote: Through His Light, all things become manifest. (Al-Ghazali, Mishkat Al-Anwar)

Divine Core.quote: The Essence is the innermost reality of all that exists. (Ibn Arabi, Futuhat)

Essential Identity.quote: The Eye of the Essence sees Itself in all things. (Al-Jili)

Divine Source.quote: From the One Eye flows all vision. (Rumi, Mathnawi)

Essential Presence.quote: Wheresoever you turn, there is the Face of Allah. (Quran 2:115)

Divine Observation.quote: He is with you wherever you are. (Quran 57:4)

Essential Being.quote: Being itself is the manifestation of the Essential Eye. (Ibn Arabi)

Divine Witnessing.quote: Is it not enough that your Lord is Witness over all things? (Quran 41:53)

Essential Nature.quote: The nature of the Essence is to be known through Its effects. (Al-Ghazali)

Divine Gaze.quote: His gaze encompasses all creation. (Ibn Arabi, Fusus)

Essential Truth.quote: Truth is that which never changes in the Eye of the Eternal. (Al-Junayd)

Divine Recognition.quote: Who knows his self knows his Lord. (Prophetic Tradition)

Essential View.quote: Every view is the view of the One Eye. (Al-Jili)

Divine Consciousness.quote: Consciousness itself is the Eye of the Divine. (Ibn Arabi)

Essential Understanding.quote: Understanding comes through the opening of the Essential Eye. (Rumi)

Divine Insight.quote: True insight comes from the Eye of Certainty. (Al-Ghazali)

Essential Awareness.quote: Awareness is the reflection of the Divine Eye. (Ibn Arabi)

Divine Comprehension.quote: Nothing is hidden from His comprehension. (Quran 10:61)

Essential Vision.quote: The Eye of the Heart sees what physical eyes cannot. (Rumi)

Divine Perspective.quote: Every perspective is contained within the Divine Eye. (Al-Jili)

Essential Witnessing.quote: In witnessing the creation, we witness the Creator. (Ibn Ata'Allah)
